scripts.prepare:holesky: npm run generate-const:holesky && npm run generate-yaml:holesky && npm run generate-types:holesky
scripts.build:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run generate-wasm:holesky
scripts.test:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run generate-tests-yaml:holesky && graph test
scripts.deploy-stage:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run deploy network:holesky env:stage
scripts.deploy-prod:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run deploy network:holesky env:prod
